item.title: Need to fuel up? Here's a chance to save!
item.description: Need to fuel up? Here's a chance to save!

item.title: Former President Trump's running mate Sen. JD Vance downplay
item.description: Former President Trump's running mate Sen. JD Vance downplayed a campaign staffer's altercation with someone at Arlington National Cemetery as a "little disagreement."

item.title: Namibia, a country in southern Africa, said it is planning t
item.description: Namibia, a country in southern Africa, said it is planning to kill over 700 wild animals including elephants and zebras to distribute the meat to its citizens struggling to secure food.
